name: Jungle Rumble – The Prehistoric 3D Fun Arcade Challenge Game with Angry Dinosaurs, Birds and Coins
name_original: Jungle Rumble – The Prehistoric 3D Fun Arcade Challenge Game with Angry Dinosaurs, Birds and Coins
description:
Life was not easy in the prehistoric era, lot's of predators rumbled around trying to eat each other. One particular species tried something else - they started to fly above the others, and soon from simple feathered dinos they became the first birds ever. You must feel now the life of a prehistoric bird through many levels of dangers and challenges!

HIGHLIGHTS
- Casual, innovative action - a flying game with drag-and-drop controls!
- Beautiful, detailed, cute cartoonish graphics!
- Various traps - from deadly lianas to another birds and kamikaze dinos!
- Collect coins - and purchase cool powerups! Slow down time or become invulnerable!

CASUAL CONTROLS
The controls are very easy to learn - just grab your bird with your finger to drive him and swing him around to avoid obstacles.

AN AMAZING WORLD
Whether you are flying through steaming jungles or prehistoric territories the beautiful and dangerous prehistoric world will never cease to amaze you! Exploring the various traps and challenges will take hours!

LOTS AND LOTS OF UNLOCKABLES
Collect coins and spend them in the shop to unlock many new skins and upgrades! You’d like to play as different bird? A Black one? A multicolored one? A Seagull? Be our guest!

For more information please visit our website: www.pocketscientists.com
Join our fan club on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PocketScientists?fref=ts
For support or inquiries please contact us here: info@pocketscientists.com
Thank you for playing Jungle Rumble - The Prehistoric Challenge
